name: Less Is More (LAgg)
description:
What's Up developers I am so glad that I could participate in this year jam I have a lot of fun working on this game and  I  hope you like it and find it funny to. 

All the assets in the game was made by me during the time of the jam or from a free source.
All art and code work made by me.
All the sound FX and music are from  from opengameart or freesound or zapsplat.
